title: Happy Birthday, Rina-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Happy birthday, Rina-chan!! Today, I’m in charge of picking you up. We’ll be ready for the party soon~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Thank you, Chika-san. Rina-chan’s board「Shy」. I’m looking forward to the party. What is it going to be like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Well, the highlight of today is~.... wait, I shouldn’t say it! You have to go and see for yourself!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Is.... what? I want to know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Auu, but it’s the fun part....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Please tell me. Rina-chan’s board「Teary Eyes」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>O-, okay, I’ll tell you! You see, there’s this board game that we can all play together! I found it at a game store when I went to Tokyo the other day! It’s super fun, so I decided to give it to you as a present!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>A game that everyone can play together.... I’m so happy. Thank you, Chika-san. Also.... I want to ask you one more thing. I want to make a surprise.... as a thank you to everyone else as well. Can you help me come up with one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oooh, that sounds fun! Of course I’ll help you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I wonder what we should do. I want to do something that makes everyone smile!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
